author: China Uncensored
description:
Operation Honey Pot: Paste this emoji 🍯 in your comment below.
India and China may be talking about easing tensions—but what’s happening in the Himalayas tells a very different story.

India is spending billions of dollars carving tunnels through mountains, building roads at extreme altitudes, expanding airbases, and preparing its military for rapid deployment along the disputed Line of Actual Control. From the massive Zojila tunnel to new helipads and high-altitude airstrips, New Delhi is racing to fix a hard lesson learned during the deadly 2020 border clashes: China can move troops far faster than India could.

Meanwhile, the Chinese Communist Party has been building villages, bridges, radar systems, and military infrastructure right up to the border—turning remote terrain into a strategic advantage. While diplomats talk abou
title: India is Preparing for War with China
